text: Angela Similea (born 9 July 1946 in 1 Decembrie, Ilfov County) is a Romanian female pop star who was famous for Pop Music easy listening music in the 1980s.Denise Roman Denise Roman, Fragmented Identities: Popular Culture, Sex, and Everyday Life in Postcommunist Romania (New York: Lexington Books, 2003) 0739121189 - 2007 "In the late 1980s, the most famous Romanian vocalist-stars of muzică ușoară were Angela Similea, Corina Chiriac, and Mirabela Dauer, together with the rocker Dida Dragan and the internationally acclaimed Aura Urziceanu..." == The Golden Stag music festival == At the 1970 edition of the Golden Stag Festival, that takes place in Brașov, Romania, Similea won the second award, The Silver Stag. == References == Category:1946 births Category:Golden Stag Category:Living people Category:Romanian singers
title: Angela Similea
